message: What's the most beautiful code you've ever written?

data.message: a function you wrote and you are proud of it.
.NET wrapping lib for interoperability with vb6 that was 7 years ago before MS launches its interoperability library , This library used to fully integrate .NET solution inside VB6 legacy ERP
my first hello world program in C# :)

1- A state machine to replace MS Workflow 1.0, in cooperation with Meligy :)

2- Rawa7.com (but it can be more beautiful ;) )

3- Customization of SimpleStateMachine DSL to include more directive

4- A library for wrapping Symbian controls

5- A library for string shaping & justification, used mainly on Symbian & J2ME. Many years later, I found out that it's used - without permission - by a well-known & large mobile application company in a lot of their applications

6- Quran application, on J2ME platform, showing Quran in beautiful Othmani font, on devices which doesn't support Arabic

1.Remote Administration Tool (RAT) in VB6 Since WinSock.ocx
Then Converted it into the .NET in C# with more powerful controls.

2.Command Line App to make all operation on any text files using C++.

3.WCF/WebService to directly call the Facebook API's
